questionTitle: The teachers at the school ________ with 'flu one after the other.
The bank manager agreed to give me 200$, ________ the 500$ he had already lent me.
What do you usually ________ for delivering things?
She chose some attractive ________ paper for the Christmas present.
It was very beautiful cloth ________ from silk.
We've ________ of time to catch the train so there's no need to rush.
He put the two letters into the wrong envelopes ________ mistake.
She seems very confident but you ________ never judge by appearances.
We couldn't have our picnic because it began to ________ with rain.
The three friends all ________ for the same job.
Our plane was ________ for over four hours because of fog.
I have to be careful which soap I use, because my skin is very ________.
The government wants people to set ________ their own businesses.
He's intelligent but he ________ common sense.
I wonder who drank all the milk yesterday. It ________ have been Jane because she was out all day.
The government is opposed ________ giving people large pay rises.
I will show you his letter if I ________ it.
After the ________ journey, the President sent a request to the Prime Minister asking that they ________ their meeing until he had an opportunity to refresh himself.
He gave a dramatic ________ of his adventures in the heart of Africa.
Many people are camping for the ________ of whale hunting.
